full.title: parameter list
full.description: List of parameter values for a test case or test sequence.

full.title: variant dependencies
full.description: A condition based on variant property values. If the condition is not fulfilled, the node will not be added to the test tree. The variant property must be defined in the vtestunit.yaml. The only allowed operators are !=, == and ||.

full.title: parameter values list
full.description: List of lists of parameter values for a test case or test sequence. Each list specifies values for one parameter.
The style of combinatorics to be used for parameter generation. The default value is sequential.
